meanings.definition: The act or process of changing from one form, function, or state to another.
meanings.sent1: The conversion of the old warehouse into a modern office space was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The company's conversion to digital record-keeping saved a lot of space and time.
meanings.sent3: The conversion of the shy cat into a playful kitten surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a conversion of sadness into joy.
meanings.sent5: The conversion of the caterpillar into a butterfly is a beautiful transformation.

meanings.definition: The act of changing one's beliefs or religion.
meanings.sent1: His conversion to a plant-based diet was motivated by health reasons.
meanings.sent2: The monk's conversion to Buddhism brought him inner peace.
meanings.sent3: The alien's conversion to Earth customs led to some hilarious misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a conversion of skepticism into belief.
meanings.sent5: The conversion of the vampire into a vegetarian was unexpected.

meanings.definition: The process of expressing a quantity in a different unit of measurement.
meanings.sent1: The conversion of miles to kilometers is a common math problem.
meanings.sent2: The quick conversion of Celsius to Fahrenheit is helpful when traveling.
meanings.sent3: The conversion of apples to oranges in the equation made no sense.
meanings.sent4: Her speed was a conversion of miles per hour into kilometers per hour.
meanings.sent5: The conversion of inches to centimeters requires a simple formula.

meanings.definition: The process of changing something into a different form or use.
meanings.sent1: The conversion of the garage into a gym was a great idea.
meanings.sent2: The conversion of the old barn into a cozy home was a labor of love.
meanings.sent3: The conversion of the broken toy into a piece of art was creative.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was a conversion of colors into emotions.
meanings.sent5: The conversion of the plain dress into a stunning gown was remarkable.
